author: linonetwo
description: Focus on going to bed early and waking up early to solve the problem of waking up inefficiently and struggling to get into shape.
name: Early Sleep Early Work
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/config","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/TW-Gamification/SettingsTab","caption":"<>","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/ \define config-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/ \define config-title(name) $(config-base)$$name$ \define single-text-tag-editor(config-name) \whitespace trim
<$let currentTiddler=<> palette={{$:/palette}} tempTitle="$:/state/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/$config-name$" tabIndex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} cancelPopups="yes" > <% if [{$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/$config-name$}!match[]] %> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/$config-name$}} /> <% endif %> <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" field="text" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Add/Placeholder}} /> <$button> <> <$action-setfield tiddler=<> text={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$action-setfield tiddler=<> text="" /> {{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Add/Button}}
\end <> --- !! <> !!! <> ;<> :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/generators/pre-early-sleep" field="enabled" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> <> ;<> :<$edit-text tag="input" tiddler=<> type="number" /> ;<> :<$edit-text tag="input" tiddler=<> type="number" /> !!! <> <> <> !! <> !!! <> ;<> :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/generators/pre-early-sleep" field="enabled" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> <> !!! <> <> <> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/PeriodToPrepareSleep/Start":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/PeriodToPrepareSleep/Start","text":"22"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/PeriodToPrepareSleep/End":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/PeriodToPrepareSleep/End","text":"24"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/AllowedPreSleepEventTypes":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/AllowedPreSleepEventTypes","text":""},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/TraitTagsForTask":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/TraitTagsForTask","text":"$:/TraitTag/TMO/Task"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/actions/early-sleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/actions/early-sleep","tags":"$:/Tags/Gamification/RealityAction","find-duplicate":"debounce","debounce-duration":"43200","reality-event-amount":"1","reality-event-message":"<>","reality-event-type":"SmallReward","activity-log-type":"day-interval","activity-log":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/logs/actions/early-sleep","icon":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/icons/early-sleep}}","caption":"<>","description":"<>","enabled":"yes"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/logs/actions/early-sleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/logs/actions/early-sleep","tags":"$:/Tags/ActivityLog","hide-body":"yes","type":"application/x-tiddler-dictionary","activity-log-type":"day-interval","text":""},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/logs/generators/pre-early-sleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/logs/generators/pre-early-sleep","tags":"$:/Tags/ActivityLog","hide-body":"yes","type":"application/x-tiddler-dictionary","activity-log-type":"day-interval","text":""},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/generators/pre-early-sleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/generators/pre-early-sleep","tags":"$:/Tags/Gamification/ChangeFilter","caption":"<>","description":"<>","icon":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/icons/pre-early-sleep}}","reality-event-trigger-filter":"[!is[system]!is[draft]tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/AllowedPreSleepEventTypes}field:calendarEntry[yes]starthourlatethan{$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/PeriodToPrepareSleep/Start}endhourearlythan{$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/configs/PeriodToPrepareSleep/End}]","activity-log-type":"day-interval","activity-log":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/events/logs/generators/pre-early-sleep","find-duplicate":"debounce","debounce-duration":"43200","reality-event-amount":"1","reality-event-message":"<>","reality-event-type":"SmallReward","enabled":"yes"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/icons/early-sleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/icons/early-sleep","tags":"$:/Tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/icons/pre-early-sleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/icons/pre-early-sleep","tags":"$:/Tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/ ! <> <> !! Design Purpose Focus on the challenge of going to bed early, waking up early and being inefficient and difficult to get into shape. !! Event Sources This plugin provides event sources that are automatically triggered by the calendar, as well as button widgets for manually triggering events, and macros for customizing your own buttons. !!! Instant Feedback and Expectations Sleep on big rewards for clocking in and scheduling what you expect to do, and small rewards based on what you actually do after the fact, so that you don't feel bad even if you don't do it, and you don't get stressed out enough to cause sleeplessness. Getting instant gratification gives the feeling of letting go and then you can calm down. At work, expect only small ones and only give big ones when you actually do it, because work is about keeping expectations high so you can have high arousal levels. !!! Calendar Events Subscribing to a global new entry event that is a calendar tiddler and has not been created before, and carries a tag that is a sleep related tag set by the user, gives a reward based on the time the user sets to fall asleep. # Instantly reward early readiness for sleep with a small large reward ## with the tag "getting ready for bed" ## with the tag "reading a book" two hours before bedtime # Delayed reward for actually going to bed early the next day, with a small large reward based on the number of hours slept ## Tagged with "sleep" ## !!! OO, Launch! Focus on early work clocking in and whether tomato time was completed. # Schedule planning tasks with small mini-rewards ## Calendar entries with tiddlers tagged with "Tasks" will be rewarded with a small bonus based on the expected hours. # Tomato work, expect small multiple rewards after countdowns ## Add a "Start Tomato Clock" button under all tiddlers labeled with "Tasks", click on it to start a countdown, and give a reward when the countdown is over. # Encourage logging of problems at work with small rewards ## Edit tiddlers labeled with "Tasks" once every half an hour, with a small reward. "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Name","text":"Early Sleep Early Work"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Description","text":""Early to Bed, Early to Rise" themed event packs to earn rewards for going to bed early and learning to promote sleep before bedtime."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/Description","text":"These settings let you customise the behaviour of Early Sleep Early Work plugin."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Event/EarlySleep/Message":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Event/EarlySleep/Message","text":"Happy Early Sleep!"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Event/EarlySleep/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Event/EarlySleep/Caption","text":"Clock in early to sleep"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Event/EarlySleep/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Event/EarlySleep/Description","text":"You will be rewarded for going to bed earlier than the set time. It's best to start going to bed earlier to get ready to fall asleep. It's okay to go a little over time, it's the determination to drop everything else and come to bed that counts."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/Enable/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/Enable/Caption","text":"Enable "Prepare Sleep" Event Generator"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/Enable/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/Enable/Description","text":"Toggled to enable, the reward will be triggered when an event with the selected tag is recorded in the calendar during the selected time period."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/Start":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/Start","text":"Start"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/End":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/End","text":"End"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/EndDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/EndDescription","text":"Use 24 for 0:00 AM, otherwise it's business as usual."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/PeriodToPrepareSleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/PeriodToPrepareSleep","text":"Period of time to prepare for sleep"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/PeriodToPrepareSleepDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/PeriodToPrepareSleepDescription","text":"A time to get away from electronics and instant feedback, burn off remaining energy by learning, and get the brain ready for sleep."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/AllowedPreSleepEventTypes":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/AllowedPreSleepEventTypes","text":"types of events allowed to be done before bedtime"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/AllowedPreSleepEventTypesDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/PrepareSleep/AllowedPreSleepEventTypesDescription","text":"When using the calendar to automatically trigger rewards, only events with this tag will trigger rewards. Currently only one tag is supported, filling in multiple tags will not take effect."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Sleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Sleep","text":"Sleep"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Task":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Task","text":"Task"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Caption","text":""Complete Task" Event Generator Configs"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Enable/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Enable/Caption","text":"Enable "Complete Task" Event Generator"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Enable/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Enable/Description","text":"Toggled to enable, rewards are triggered when a task is completed, or progress is recorded on the calendar."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/TagsForTask/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/TagsForTask/Caption","text":"Set Tags For Task"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/TagsForTask/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/en-GB/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/TagsForTask/Description","text":"A tagged tiddler with this tag will be considered a task (the tag of the tag, i.e., filled in here is A, so the actual task C is related to A as, A - B - C, and the tag on the task is B). and will be rewarded when the status of the [["Super Tag"|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/super-tag/]] based task status is set to complete. (Currently only `TMO`-based supertags are supported, e.g. [[ITKG Life Management System|https://itkg.netlify.app/]] work out-of-the-box, just set `$:/TraitTag/TMO/Task` here.)"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/ ! <> <> !! 设计目的 关注早睡早起，起床后低效率难进入状态的难题。 !! 事件源 本插件提供由日历自动触发的事件源，以及手动触发事件的按钮微件，和用于定制自己的按钮的宏。 !!! 即时反馈与期待 睡眠上对打卡和预期要做的安排给予大奖励，对事后实际做到的事情基于小奖励，这样即使没做到也不会感觉很可惜，就不会压力过大导致睡不着。获得即时满足后，就有放下的感觉，然后可以平静下来。 工作上，预期只给小的，实际做到了才给大的，因为工作就是要保持高期待，从而能有高唤醒水平。 !!! 日历事件 订阅全局新条目事件，是日历条目且之前未创建过，而且带的标签是用户设定的睡眠相关标签，就根据用户设定的入睡时间给予奖励。 # 即时奖励提早准备入睡的行为，给予小额大奖励 ## 带有「准备睡觉」标签的 ## 在入睡时间前两小时，带有「阅读书籍」标签的 # 延迟奖励第二天实际早睡了的行为结果，根据睡眠时长给予大额小奖励 ## 带有「睡觉」标签的 !!! OO，启动！ 关注早起工作打卡，以及是否完成了番茄时间。 # 安排规划任务，给予小额小奖励 ## 日历条目，带上『带有「任务」标签』的条目作为标签，便根据预期时长给予小额小奖励 # 番茄工作法，期待倒计时后的小额多次的大奖励 ## 在带有「任务」标签的条目下都加上「开始番茄钟」按钮，点击后开始一个倒计时，倒计时结束后给予奖励 # 鼓励记录工作中的问题，给予小额小奖励 ## 半小时一次，编辑带有「任务」标签』的条目，给予小额小奖励 "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Name","text":"早睡早起"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Description","text":"以「早点上床早点起床」为主题的事件包，在早睡和睡前学习促眠时获得奖励"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/Description","text":"通过这些设置，您可以自定义「早睡早起」插件的行为。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Event/EarlySleep/Message":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Event/EarlySleep/Message","text":"早睡快乐！"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Event/EarlySleep/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Event/EarlySleep/Caption","text":"打卡早睡"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Event/EarlySleep/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Event/EarlySleep/Description","text":"早于设定的时间入睡，将获得奖励。最好提前开始上床准备入睡。稍微超出时间也没事，重要的是放下其他事情来睡觉的决心。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/Enable/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/Enable/Caption","text":"启用「准备早睡」事件生成器"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/Enable/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/Enable/Description","text":"勾选启用后，当在所选时段内往日历上记录带所选标签的事件时会触发奖励"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/Start":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/Start","text":"开始"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/End":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/End","text":"结束"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/EndDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/EndDescription","text":"使用 24 表示凌晨 0 点整，此外照常。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/PeriodToPrepareSleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/PeriodToPrepareSleep","text":"准备入睡的时间段"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/PeriodToPrepareSleepDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/PeriodToPrepareSleepDescription","text":"在这段时间内远离电子产品和即时反馈，通过学习消耗剩余的精力，让大脑准备好入睡。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/AllowedPreSleepEventTypes":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/AllowedPreSleepEventTypes","text":"允许睡前做的事件类型"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/AllowedPreSleepEventTypesDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/PrepareSleep/AllowedPreSleepEventTypesDescription","text":"使用日历自动触发奖励时，只有带有这个标签的事件会触发奖励。目前只支持一个标签，填写多个标签不会生效。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Sleep":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Sleep","text":"睡眠"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Task":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Task","text":"任务"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Caption","text":"「完成任务」事件生成器设置"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Enable/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Enable/Caption","text":"启用「完成任务」事件生成器"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Enable/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/Enable/Description","text":"勾选启用后，当任务完成，或在日历上记录进度时会触发奖励"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/TagsForTask/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/TagsForTask/Caption","text":"设置任务条目的标签"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/TagsForTask/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/language/zh-Hans/Configs/CompleteTaskEventGenerator/TagsForTask/Description","text":"带有这个标签的标签条目将被视为任务（即标签的标签，这里填的是 A，那么实际的任务 C 与 A 的关系是，A - B - C，任务上打的标签是 B）。当它上面基于「[[超级标签|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/super-tag/]]」插件的任务状态被设置为完成时，将会获得奖励。（目前仅支持基于 `TMO` 的超级标签，例如[[ITKG 人生管理系统|https://itkg.netlify.app/]]可以开箱即用，这里设置为 `$:/TraitTag/TMO/Task` 即可）"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/early-sleep-early-work/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure
